name: HOLONGLIDE
description: HOLONGLIDE is Casual yet Challenging Platformer. The aim of HOLONGLIDE is to test the player's problem solving skills, muscle memory and finger dexterity. Featuring over 90 LEVELS and an ADVANCED DIFFICULTY mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM
